content: avert the apocalypse with your very own aziraphale and crowley amigurumi this pattern uses textured stitches and applique to create the details that make our duo recognisable please let me know if you spot any errors in the pattern this was a fairly complicated project so there are bound to be mistakes somewhere stitches used slip_stitch double_crochet invdec invisible decrease half_double_crochet treble_crochet dtr fldc front loop double_crochet fldec front loop decrease magic_ring whipped back stitch straight stitch bouillon stitch i was absolutely devastated by the end of season 2 so this is my therapy together with a newfound appreciation for the music of queen counts as fanart right good omens and all related characters belong to neil gaiman and terry pratchett if anyone wants to yeet this at @neilhimself on one of those newfangled social media platforms i d appreciate it i need season 3 it just can t end like that
